mapper.select: SELECT p.proj_post_code, p.proj_post_title, u.user_code, u.user_nick, p.created_date, p.modified_date, pt.tag_content FROM proj_post p JOIN user u ON ( p.user_code = u.user_code ) LEFT JOIN proj_tag pt ON ( p.proj_post_code = pt.proj_post_code ) WHERE p.del_status = false ORDER BY p.created_date DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT p.proj_post_code, p.proj_post_title, p.proj_post_content, p.proj_url, u.user_code, u.user_nick, p.created_date, p.modified_date, pt.tag_content FROM proj_post p JOIN user u ON ( p.user_code = u.user_code ) LEFT JOIN proj_tag pt ON ( p.proj_post_code = pt.proj_post_code ) WHERE p.proj_post_code = #{projPostCode} AND p.del_status = false

SELECT p.proj_post_code, p.proj_post_title, u.user_code, u.user_nick, p.created_date, p.modified_date, pt.tag_content FROM proj_post p JOIN user u ON ( p.user_code = u.user_code ) LEFT JOIN proj_tag pt ON ( p.proj_post_code = pt.proj_post_code ) WHERE p.del_status = false AND pt.tag_content = #{tag} ORDER BY p.created_date DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
